features: MAXIMUM STRENGTH 10% BENZOYL PEROXIDE: Strongest over-the-counter (OTC) strength concentration without a prescription
STARTS WORKING FAST: Starts working immediately to help clear acne while also preventing future breakouts
EFFECTIVE, PROVEN RESULTS: Helps eliminate 99.99% of acne-causing bacteria in 15 seconds *Based on an independent laboratory in vitro study
DUAL-ACTION FOAMING FORMULA: Cream to foam cleanser, suitable for face and all over body, including chest and back
HOW TO USE: Wet area to be cleansed, apply and massage into skin for 20-30 seconds, rinse thoroughly and pat dry
body.description: Differin Maximum Strength Acne Foaming Cleanser is a cream to foam acne face wash and body wash designed specifically for acne-prone skin. Formulated with 10% benzoyl peroxide (BPO), the strongest OTC strength concentration without a prescription, it starts working immediately to help clear acne while also preventing future breakouts. This dual-action formula acne wash can be used for face and all over body, including chest and back, helping you target and cleanse acne breakouts where they can pop up most. Micronized benzoyl peroxide penetrates into the skin to eliminate most acne-causing bacteria, resulting in longer-lasting clearer skin, and has shown to be less irritating than traditional non-micronized benzoyl peroxide formulas. Use as a part of your daily cleansing routine to assist with acne treatment. Apply to wet skin and gently massage for about 20-30 seconds, avoiding the eye area. Rinse the facial cleanser and body cleanser thoroughly and pat dry for best results. Start with one application daily and gradually increase to two or three times a day as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great For Teens!
reviews.reviewText: My son is almost 15 and started getting breakouts. This cleared his skin so fast! I think it’s drying for an adult, but his oily teen skin it’s been perfect. Makes him even look cleaner (he has great hygiene) but his skin used to be oily. Leaves a nice matte look now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WELL KNOWN BRAND! Great quality!
reviews.reviewText: You have nothing to complain about! The PRODUCT WORKS AS INTENDED , but dang! BE PATIENT AND GIVE IT TIME TO WORK! this is no magic facewash!NOTE: i have very sensitive skin from year of dry shaving or shaving with cold water in above freezing weather in the military, so don’t expect no miracle when it stays “for sensitive skin” . Product refers to healthy sensitive skin(like sun light sensitive). Not my type of skin. Expect to use a soothing cream, or PURE UNPROCESSED COCONUT OIL FOR MAX RESULTS!(if you even find it :s)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect! Just what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: My dermatologist recommends face wash that's 10% Benzoyl Peroxide, so this is perfect and keeps my face nice clean. I also love that it qualifies as a FSA/HSA purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ease your way into it!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this for about 3 weeks after suffering huge breakouts around my cheeks/chin & neck for the last 2-3 months. It works but it's very important to not overdo it at first.1. Start off with once a day & gradually work your way to twice towards the end of the first week2. PROTECT YOUR EYES! I had to coat all around my eyes with Vaseline before washing so the product wouldn't burn them. It helps a lot with the delicate skin. Even if you rinse your whole face at once or will irritate them & burn the skin around your eyes. I didn't have to do this after about 1.5-2 weeks3. Benzoyl peroxide can bleach fabric so use white towels so you don't ruin them.4. Rub into skin for a minute for faster results5. Use a heavy moisturizer & spf after. Your skin will feel very dry if not but any product you use after will absorb very fastAfter frequent breakouts, I've only had 2-3 single pimples since using this.. my skin texture & oilyness has improved greatly.There's not really a smell & it barely lathers unless you use a lot of water. There's a very mild exfoliating texture so I have to use a little bigger than a quarter size amount for it to wash my face & neck. A little doesn't really go a long way with this. At least for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff
reviews.reviewText: I am 42 and I get back break outs monthly. This has helped me so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite brand
reviews.reviewText: I am over 60 and it’s the only skincare line I use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works SO GOOD!
reviews.reviewText: i love the differian brand, i used their gel for retinol and then now the face wash.. keeps my face super clear! and you get so much formula in the bottle, you do not need to use much at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Impaired skin barrier
reviews.reviewText: This cleanser comes out creamy and foams well. Didn't expect the micronized benzoyl peroxide to be so drying. Has a graininess that reminds me of exfoliating. That wasn't the issue. Washed my face the first time and the sides of my face felt dry. Second time, I felt it was ok and maybe it was just a one time thing with a new product being introduced to my skin.The third time however, proved that wasn't the case. It depended on the contact time. Washing my face between 1-2 minutes or leaving it as a mask for 5 minutes isn't possible. The faster this washes off the better. I bought this when my Panoxyl cleanser finished. I've only used differin adapalene gel and no other products from the brand. So when I saw their new cleanser, I wanted to try but it's not for me.I didn't have issues with dryness when using Panoxyl 4% and 10% cleanser when washing my face between 1-2 minutes unless I left it on my face as a mask longer than 5 minutes. I primarily use the 10% as it works better for my acne. I wanted to use this cleanser like it but couldn't. Skin barrier impaired as it's more dry than usual and stings.
